src:
Grozljivka v novomeški bolnišnici: moški skočil iz tretjega nadstropja in umrl
Policija je dogodek potrdila.
03 Nov 2019, 16:15 by P. K.
NOVO MESTO – Dopoldne naj bi v novomeški bolnišnici z balkona skočil moški in pri tem izgubil življenje.Pri novomeški policijski upravi so potrdili, da so na številko policije 113 ob 11.30 dobili obvestilo, da je v bolnišnici z balkona tretjega nadstropja padel moški, poroča Dolenjski list. Policisti so ugotovili, da gre za 63-letnega moškega, pacienta, ki je za posledicami padca umrl na kraju. O dogodku sta bila obveščena dežurni preiskovalni sodnik in okrožna državna tožilka. Odrejena je bila sanitarna obdukcija, po prvih ugotovitvah pa je tuja krivda izključena, je za Dolenjski list pojasnil Robert Perc iz PU Novo mesto.
text:
Horror at Novo mesto Hospital: A man jumped from the third floor and died
Police confirmed the incident.
03 Nov 2019, 15:15 by P.K.
NEW PLACE - A man is said to have jumped from a balcony in the hospital in the morning and lost his life.The police in Novo mesto confirmed that they received a message from police at 113:30 at the hospital that a man had fallen from the third-floor balcony, Dolenjski reports list. Officers identified the man as a 63-year-old man, a patient who died on the spot as a result of the crash. The judge on duty and the District Attorney were informed of the incident. A sanitary autopsy was ordered, and according to initial findings, foreign guilt was ruled out, Robert Perc of the Novo mesto Police Department explained to Dolenjski List.
